title: [Dynamic Regions] sibling check failed during commit merge
body:
## Bug Report

### What version of TiKV are you using?
<!-- You can run `tikv-server --version` -->

https://github.com/tikv/tikv/pull/15614 (Just added some debug logs)
commit: https://github.com/tikv/tikv/commit/9ba1d650dc4d09a4f98c7e5e84f3c7d824635464

comments_data.body: Close this issue temporarily since Dynamic Regions project is paused.
